title: F/T Beater T206 lot of 100+ with Tolstoi + SL'ers
author: btcarfagno

posts.post_title: F/T Beater T206 lot of 100+ with Tolstoi + SL'ers
posts.post_content:
Won this lot at the Clean Sweep auction pretty much just to be able to hold this many T206's at one time. Now that this has worn off the reality of breaking it up and selling it piece by pice has set in.

Not good.

So...I am looking for someone who would trade me something of equal value to what I paid for the lot.

The lot includes 6 Southern Leaguers, 7 Tolstoi backs, 1 EPDG, 3 Old Mill and a Polar Bear. There are also about 4 horizontals. 

Let me know if you are interested and what you have to trade. 

Email me at [url]tom@regalfinancialgroup.com[/url]

Thanks!

Tom C

how much did you pay for the lot?






[quote name="btcarfagno" post=843016]Won this lot at the Clean Sweep auction pretty much just to be able to hold this many T206's at one time. Now that this has worn off the reality of breaking it up and selling it piece by pice has set in.

Not good.

So...I am looking for someone who would trade me something of equal value to what I paid for the lot.

The lot includes 6 Southern Leaguers, 7 Tolstoi backs, 1 EPDG, 3 Old Mill and a Polar Bear. There are also about 4 horizontals. 

Let me know if you are interested and what you have to trade. 

Email me at [url]tom@regalfinancialgroup.com[/url]

Thanks!

Tom C[/QUOTE]
I am into it for $1,000 including buyers premium and shipping.
Any ideas on what you might want in trade?

I prefer graded vintage. Would need to get slightly higher than $1,000 at VCP Avg...maybe $1,200 worth or so. $1,000 cash would do it as well.

Tom C
